snippet: Novak Djokovic will face 2009 U.S. Open champion Juan Martin del Potro in the first round of the Olympics in a rematch of the 2012 bronze medal match....
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic will face 2009 U.S. Open champion Juan Martin del Potro in the first round of the Olympics in a rematch of the 2012 bronze medal match.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic Faces 2009 US Open Champ Del Potro in Rio 1st Round
headline.main: Djokovic Faces 2009 US Open Champ Del Potro in Rio 1st Round
